amendment.description: To amend the resolving clause to correct the date of the ceremony.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2711 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2711 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Booker. (consideration: CR S7281; text: CR S7281) To amend the resolving clause to correct the date of the ceremony.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2711 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Booker.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2711 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
